description: "A map of Southeast Asia by the London-based cartographer Herman Moll (1654?–1732) with hand-coloured regional borders. The north coast of Borneo is labelled ‘A Desart [desert] Coast’, while the south is labelled ‘Pepper Country’."
title: "The   principal   islands   of   the   East   Indies,   according   to   ye   newest   observations"
